tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I would definitely recommend Dr Amulya for the perfect treatment and advice.  She answered all of my queries patiently.

I have been to multiple doctors and I think she is just amazing she listens to patient and wait until the patient completes the statement before jumping into conclusion. She explained everything very well.

Doctor is very friendly. Environment is good. Staff is well trained and environment very clean and tidy. 

The main thing is both doctors madam and sir are really polite and calm to listen to problems and spend enough time in listening to the issue. Visited Madam for my wife and Sir for my kid. Really happy  all queries got addressed currently pursuing with medicines recommended by doctor quite optimist on recovery of my wife since doctor also told it's nothing to be conceened about and quite normal.

She is an amazing and very attentive doctor. Pays loads of attention to pt's concerns. Recently I visited her for my pregnancy. She is amazing both as an obstetrician and as a scan doctor.. she did my anomaly scan as well and answered all my queries very patiently. This place has comprehensive care strategy - the doc, lab and medicines all under one roof , less waitin time compared to any corporate hospitals. would recommend all needy women to visit her for a wholesome care.. 
Thanks Dr Amulya

Doctor is very friendly to talk...she answered to all our queries with lots of patience..her diagnosis was perfect...she advised only few and necessary investigations...got relief of symptoms from the next day itself...Thanks alot doctor for bringing smile on my face and relieving me from the pain and discomfort I was suffering from a long time..I strongly recommend her if u are looking for a compassionate Obstetrician and gynaecologist...she was recommended to me by my cousin who had underwent pregnancy scan at her clinic..she was very happy that the doctor didn't rush through the scan and performed with great patience...

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: It's pleasure to share my experience, Dr Amulya pays lots of attention to her patients.It was our first pregenency ,She made us very comfortable on every visit.One instance she waited 20 mins to get a right scan ,we are grateful for her ingenuity , patience and humility.She is very much approachable over phone and whatsapp. A big thanks to Amulya doctor üôè

Highly satisfying experience Dr Amulya is among those doctors who add their 'personal touch' while treating their patients. With her calm, poised and empathetic attitude, she helps the patients/ expecting parents to gain confidence, and have a smooth journey during pregnancy.Highly Recommend

*** ** *** **** ***** friendly gynaecologist in Bangalore  who give more care and attention towards patients...once u visit this doctor u will come  to know...**** *** ******* ** **** ******.I would give five out five to dr. Amulya for her genuine care and service towards patients..

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
My wife was pregnent and we were very fortunate to visit Skanda clinic where we could consult Dr. Amulya R. Though there was severe vomit, her advice and care made it easy for my wife to go through those initial months. We wished we could continue with the same clinic but had to travel to native and consult a different doctor. I will strongly recommend others to consult Dr. Amulya R without any hesitation whatso ever.  
Note : we are blessed with Baby Boy

She is very talented and picks up the problems in earlier stages only. She is very proactive.
She‚Äôs the friendliest doctor I have met. She was so calm and answered all my queries with accuracy. Thankyou so much

Good experience.Doctors respond well.specially DR. Amulya madam is very good hearted person.she gave us good prescription.its help us lot.Thank you
She was very patient in listening to my problems. She answered all my queries without any hurry. Overall had a very good experience and I would strongly recommend her!
I went to dr Amulya for my health issues , she spoke to us with patience n counselled us in detail . She also listened to  us with full patience . I highly recommend this doctor

I had visited Dr.Amulya for entire pregnancy scanning and experience was super awesome,as she is very patient with always keeping pleasant smile,explains everything very nicely and clearly which is very much needed in each scan..

I went to dr amulya for my periods problem ,she spoke very well n listened to my complaints in detail, she also did a scan then n there ,explained very well .I was very satisfied n happy also , I strongly recommend this doctor

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Dr. Amulya is extremely patient, alert, vigilant and caring. I was pregnant with triplets...and for scanning all the babies it would take lot of time, she was commendable...she would scan with at most care. She was one of the key reason that I could deliver all the babies within good time.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I had visited doctor amulya for my pregnancy scans.she has the utmost patience to scan each organ perfectly since mine was twin pregnancy.she would wait until she sees all as expected with happy face.and advice and notify us in advance in case of anamoly detected.I would strongly recommend doctor amulya for pregnancy or scan.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review: First I want to tell thank you for  madam, whenever I am consulting to madam  she is responding friendly and also comunincaton is good, she is clear all our doubts immidiatly, ********* *** **** ****.when I have tens with my delivery time she is supporting a lot because I had normal delivery. She adviced to medicine, hygine and taking care of baby.  All around  it is vary good treatment they given to me, I am so  happy  to contact with Dr Amulya madam thanking you  once again.

I had a very good experience..Dr.amulya mam was very helpful and friendly in all the aspects including all the staff members in the hospital.I was been taken extreme care..I highly recommend the hospital and their service.Thank you ma‚Äôam for your advice and immense help.

My wife taking treatment from Dr. Amulya. ***** * **** **** *** ********* ******* if there is any problem she will explain it very nicely and she will suggest solution properly, whenever we call her she will respond immediately at any time. She's a very friendly and kind hearted Doctor. I will recommend Dr. Amulya to my friends and relatives.

This is my first pregnancy, it's 9 th month now, I had problems throughout my pregnancy. Urine infection, more fluid, back pain, gastric. I'm taking treatment from starting with Dr. Amulya. She is very kind and friendly doctor I have ever seen. Whenever I call her she responded immediately and suggested for my problem. I completely recommend Dr. Amulya for your precious pregnancy.
